caption.p: SEM image of pristine CNT (photograph of a flexible CNT in inset) ( a); TEM image of pristine CNT ( b); SEM image of p-sulfonated poly(allyl phenyl ether) (SPAPE)-coated CNT and ( c) TEM image of SPAPE-coated CNT ( d); and EDS spectra of pristine CNT (the inset is the corresponding TEM image) ( e).
